roleset.name: sterben

example.name: with cognate object
example.text: The letter, along with a detailed prosecution memo, sat on the desks of Justice officials for months before the case died a quiet death.

roleset.note: 'sterben' is German for 'to die'. Member of VNcls dissappearance-48.2.

roleset.name: semi modal: wanting to, really bad

example.name: both args (sort of)
example.text: An IED ambush has none of those risks . Only one man needs to be on the spot - the triggerman . He detonates the IED from a car parked down a side street and drives away before the occupiers can even start their search . No risk . No casualties . Very demoralizing for the occupiers , especially since they know damn well that everybody in the neighborhood was in on the attack but they ca n't level the locals ' shacks like they 're dying to .

example.name: worth dying for?
example.text: She was just dying to have her picture with the woodpeckers at Universal Studios!
example.arg: to have her picture with the woodpeckers at Universal Studios

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT.

predicate.note: Frames file for 'die' based on sentences in financial subcorpus.

example.text: And as the applause dies down in showrooms along Seventh Avenue and Broadway, stylishly clad Campeau buyers will begin writing orders.
example.arg: in showrooms along Seventh Avenue and Broadway

roleset.name: go extinct, terminate completely

example.name: ULA example
example.text: Although Yiddish-1 has been in danger of *PRO*-1 dying out for hundreds of years , the language is spoken today by millions of people throughout the world

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on ULA. No VNcls.

roleset.name: become dead (as a group), bit by bit

example.name: ULA example
example.text: There are many other , lesser factors at work , but taken together , all tend toward standardization , especially as the older speakers die off .

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on ULA. No VNcls.
